name: Mostachito Jump
description:
Mostachito Jump is a super jump adventure across different city environments and against a lot of funnies enemies. Based on T-Rex jump adventure, Mostachito jump offer a more rich features to make fun the game experience.

Collect coins and chilies to get additional life and jump as fast as possible to avoid all enemies that coming at you.
At the end of each stage waiting for you a wonderful challenger with 5 epic Bosses.

HOW TO PLAY
+ Click on right mouse button or press space bar or up arrow to jump.
+ Collect coins and chilies to get extra life.
+ Get the booster to overcome easily your enemies.

FEATURES
+ Easy, intuitive controls, only one touch to play.
+ Classic platform game style.
+ More than 30 levels, several enemies and 5 epic Bosses.
+ Nice graphics and sounds.
+ Game is free, no purchase required no advertisement is present
+ Suitable with kids and children.

I'm working on more levels for a future update.
